com.nomicflux.wuwei

Class STRefModifier<A>

  • Object
    • STRefModifier<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Type of the value in the reference which will be mutated

    public class STRefModifier<A>
extends Object
    Utility class for creating composable units of work on STRefs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • modifier

        public static <A> STRefModifier<A> modifier(Fn1<A,A> fn)
        Create a modification step in an STRef pipeline.
        Type Parameters:
        A - Type of the value in the reference
        Parameters:
        fn - Function used to modify reference value
        Returns:
        STRefModifier which modifies an STRef with fn

      • writer

        public static <A> STRefModifier<A> writer(A a)
        Create a writing step in an STRef pipeline.
        Type Parameters:
        A - Type of the value in the reference
        Parameters:
        a - Value to be written into a reference
        Returns:
        STRefModifier which writes an a to an STRef

      • run

        public <S> Fn1<STRef<S,A>,ST<S,STRef<S,A>>> run()
        Run a series of STRefModifiers within an ST context. Calling this method will expose the state type parameter S, so it can only be used in a chain of flatMaps.
        Type Parameters:
        S - Type parameter used to unify ST steps
        Returns:
        Function used within a flatMap to alter a STRef

      • and

        public STRefModifier<A> and(STRefModifier<A> next)
        Compose this STRefModifier with another. A writer will drop all previous STRefModifiers as it overwrites all previous work, for lawful uses of a STRef.
        Parameters:
        next - The next STRefModifier to be used after this one
        Returns:
        A STRefModifier consisting of the chained modifiers
